thread.title: This little Bulldog is ready for Saturday's big game
thread.title_full: This little Bulldog is ready for Saturday's big game

title: This little Bulldog is ready for Saturday's big game
text:
Posted: 3:46 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015 This little Bulldog is ready for Saturday's big game View Larger Brant Sanderlin September 26, 2015 Athens , GA: Que, the grand-son of Uga IX could soon officially become Uga X. Georgia Bulldogs against the Southern University Jaguars in Athens Saturday September 26, 20015. BRANT SANDERLIN/BSANDERLIN@AJC.COM Related By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
One of this weekend's biggest college football games takes place in Athens, Ga., Saturday. 
The slightly down Alabama Crimson Tide visit the undefeated Georgia Bulldogs in what could likely be an instant classic. (The last time Alabama came into town , it wasn't quite so.) 
>> Read more trending stories 
The pregame chatter includes Georgia running back Nick Chubb's streak of 12 straight games with 100+ yards rushing (tied with former Heisman winner Herschel Walker for the school record) vs. Alabama's streak of not giving up 100 rushing yards to an SEC opponent in 10 straight games, according to SEC Network. 
There's also big talk about the lack of parking spots available in Athens . 
One reporter caught up with a Georgia fan, a bulldog named Sugar, before the big showdown to ask some tough questions. A video posted by WSB-TV (@wsbtv) on Oct 2, 2015 at 6:56pm PDT
